channel.title: Problems With PVPScape Source
channel.description:
Hey, guys, just a quick problem:
I downloaded PVPscape source and began running it through my server. After about 30 seconds of up time, the server gave a message saying that PVPScape was possibly under attack and that it needed to restart. After that, the server would not come back up. It told me that the port was already in use and then that I needed java to start up the server. I obviously already have Java. Any suggestions, resolutions, etc?[br][size=1]Posted on: January 16, 2007, 09:53:48 PM[/size][hr]Bump

item.title: Problems With PVPScape Source
item.dc:creator: @VorargC VorargC
item.description:
@VorargC wrote:

do you have the sdk java? i think you need that.

Read full topic

item.title: Problems With PVPScape Source
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Just replied to your message about it. Instructions are in that message. Once you do that, I suggest you restart your computer to close java fully.

Read full topic
